ValidationRule.description: Prevents a record being saved if customer ID starts with 3HZN and GPS is not equal to Horizon SHBP, Horizon Fully-Insured or Community Support Program - NO COACH
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL( ClientName__c , 'Horizon'), BEGINS( CustomerID__c, "3HZN"),
NOT( OR( Group_PlanSponsor__c = "Horizon SHBP", Group_PlanSponsor__c = "Horizon Fully-Insured", Group_PlanSponsor__c = "Community Support Program - NO COACH", Group_PlanSponsor__c = "RWJBH",
Group_PlanSponsor__c = "Call Request" ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Customer ID starts with 3HZN, Group Plan Sponsor must be Horizon SHBP, Horizon Fully-Insured or Community Support Program - NO COACH
